attributes.action: Make right the wrong this government has done to the windrush generation
attributes.additional_details:
Became  I had no proof of my status, I lost my job, could not get any benefits. I only survived because of help from family and friends.
I just wish there was some way I could open the governments eyes and show them they should not trample over the little people like they did with the windrush generation.
attributes.background:
I come to this country in December 1968. I never had any problem finding work or getting by in general. I would consider myself a very good law abiding citizen.
In 2012 I needed help as I could not work because of a broken leg.I was let down very badly by this government.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take to right the wrongs done to the Windrush Generation.

You might like to sign this petition instead, which calls for public inquiry into the Government's treatment of the Windrush Generation:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234560
